      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        This method here serves for the implementation of Observer Pattern in our Project. It handles Domination view during game play as per risk rules.This class here is being observed by ManageDomination as an observer.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
